scc.releaseInfo:
- For All Platforms - -- Updated SCAP content based on NIWC content for DISA Q1 2025 release of STIG manuals -- Updated internal dependencies -- Fixed several minor issues, see release notes for details.
- For Windows - -- Added support for Windows user test attributes of 'full_name', 'comment' and 'password_age'
- For Linux - -- Added NIWC Enhanced DISA STIG content for Ubuntu 22.04
- For Solaris - -- N/A
